name: groupUpdate
description:
Update a [group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204519819-Group-Management-) under your account. **Prerequisite**: Pro, Business, or Education account
**Scopes**: `group:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

groupId.description:
The group ID.
Can be retrieved by calling [GET /groups](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/groups/groups).

name.description: Group name. It must be unique to one account and less than 128 characters.
